CustomField.formula: TEXT(YEAR( DATEVALUE(Timestamp__c) )) & '~~~' & IF(LEN(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Timestamp__c)))) == 2, TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Timestamp__c))), '0' & TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Timestamp__c)))) & '~~~' & IF(LEN(TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Timestamp__c)))) == 2, TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Timestamp__c))), '0' & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Timestamp__c))))
CustomField.label: Timestamp String
